result.title: Initial Data Management Plan
result.description: A first version of Data Management Plan DMP will be prepared defining data that will be generated by the project whether and how it will be exploited or made accessible for verification and reuse and how it will be curated and preserved The purpose of this deliverable is to support the data management life cycle for all data collected processed and or generated by the project and cover which aspects will be shared with interested third parties in and which data will be open and free manner This first version of the DMP will be delivered within the first six months of the project

result.title: Guidelines on legal and ethical issues
result.description: This deliverable will include the ethical considerations and legal restrictions of data used in ENVISION as well as moral considerations regarding the use of human subjects in project activities Moreover it will present an an analysis of the ethical and legal framework regarding project specific activities to produce guidelines for project partners for safeguarding decisionmaking processes relevant to critical issues eg recruitment of research participants ensuring privacy and protection of personal information use of existing data including public data etc

result.title: Gender Situation Analysis and Needs Assessment
result.description: This deliverable will present the gender dimension within the project by clearly articulating the gender relevance to all WPs estimating how research fundings apply to the specific needs of all sexes ensuring data disaggregation on sex and gender related issues eg marital status and considering all intersecting factors eg ethnicity disability sexual orientation It will also tackle dissemination issues of the project and its results focusing on the appropriate channels that need to be used in order to ensure equal reach to all sexes ie engage women associations to disseminate information to female stakeholders

result.title: Market Outlook Analysis
result.description: This deliverable will aim to address a quantitative and qualitative research and assessment of the ENVISION market it will focus firstly on the size of the market and namely the profile and current status concerning the target groups of PAs and CBs as well as potential Lighthouse Customers to fully assess the market segments and their potential A review of the potential competitors landscape and respective positioning of ENVISION with its strengths and weaknesses will feed the analysis concerning the relative actors Lastly a PESTLE analysis will summarize the external environment and respective market drivers market size economic legal and institutional conditions etc within each country and on a broader European basis

result.description: This deliverable will refine and enrich the set of suitable existing techniques and technologies currently available in order to produce the latest system architecture and design for the ENVISION platform.
